statements: SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata;
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_name FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_size > 1000;
SELECT ar_content_type, ar_content_size, ar_content_name FROM ARContentMetadata ORDER BY ar_content_size DESC;
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_description FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_type = 'image';
SELECT ar_content_name, ar_content_path FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_description LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_name, ar_content_description FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_type = 'image' ORDER BY ar_content_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_name, ar_content_size FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_type = 'video' ORDER BY ar_content_size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_size > 1000 AND ar_content_type != 'audio';
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_name, ar_content_description FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_type = '3D Model' ORDER BY ar_content_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_content_path, ar_content_type FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE ar_content_size BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata;
SELECT title, description, author FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM ARContentMetadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ARContentImages WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, caption FROM ARContentImages WHERE caption LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, author FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND author = 'Alice' ORDER BY title
SELECT title, description, created_at FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE description LIKE '%AR%' AND author != 'Bob' LIMIT 3
SELECT cm.title, ci.image_url, ci.caption FROM ARContentMetadata AS cm JOIN ARContentImages AS ci ON cm.id = ci.content_id WHERE cm.id = 2
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ARContentMetadata ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_url FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ARTags WHERE tag_name = 'science';
SELECT content_name, content_url FROM ARContentMetadata INNER JOIN ContentTagMapping ON ARContentMetadata.id = ContentTagMapping.content_id WHERE ContentTagMapping.tag_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE content_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT content_description, content_url FROM ARContentMetadata WHERE content_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY content_url ASC;
SELECT tag_name FROM ARTags WHERE tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM ContentTagMapping WHERE content_id = 2);
SELECT cm.content_name, at.tag_name FROM ARContentMetadata cm JOIN ContentTagMapping ctm ON cm.id = ctm.content_id JOIN ARTags at ON ctm.tag_id = at.tag_id ORDER BY cm.id ASC, at.tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_name, author FROM ar_content_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT author, hash FROM ar_content_metadata WHERE content_name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_name, creation_date FROM ar_content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ar_tags ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_metadata;
SELECT content_name, author, creation_date FROM ar_content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content_name, creation_date FROM ar_content_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM ar_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'tech%';
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content;
SELECT content_name, content_type, uploaded_date FROM ar_content ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM ar_tags WHERE tag_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ar_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT * FROM ar_content ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM ar_tags GROUP BY tag_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
SELECT content_name, username FROM ar_content JOIN ar_users ON ar_content.id = ar_users.user_id WHERE content_type = 'Video';
